alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Manatee; Inland Hernando; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Manatee; Inland Pasco; Pinellas; Polk; Sumter (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 07 at 11:44AM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Sumter, Pasco, southeastern Hernando, northwestern Manatee, Pinellas, Hillsborough and northwestern Polk Counties through 1245 PM EDT... At 1144 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near St. Leo to 7 miles west of Bay Pines. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tampa, Clearwater, Lakeland, Largo, Bradenton, Pinellas Park, Plant City, Winter Haven, Temple Terrace, Haines City, Bartow, Seminole, Auburndale, Zephyrhills, Palmetto, Dade City, Downtown Saint Petersburg, Fort Desoto Park, Fish Hawk and Saint Petersburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Manatee; Inland Hernando; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Manatee; Inland Pasco; Pinellas; Polk; Sumter
